Articles.Content: I did not see either of these in the "already suggested" list and I am sorry if it was and I did not see it. The first one is that believe that a new science piece should be added called the drill.This drill would be able to take ice cores from ice on different planets and moons in exchange for science in career mode. I also think it would be cool if you could build submarines and explore underwater to preform sub-surface experiments. Any feedback would be appreciated.

Welcome to the forums!

Submarines technically fall under "Oceanic exploration," which is on the WNTS list; however, I believe core sampling drills should be fair game for discussion.
You can make Carriers with the Boat Parts mod
